aboutMe.headline: About me
aboutMe.text1: I am a frontend developer currently living in Weinfelden, Switzerland. I specialize in creating intuitive and visually appealing user interfaces, utilizing the latest technologies and best practices in web development. My passion lies in crafting seamless and efficient user experiences.
aboutMe.text2: Analytical thinking and problem-solving are my key strengths. I excel at breaking down complex issues into manageable parts and finding effective solutions. My methodical approach and attention to detail ensure that I consistently deliver high-quality results.
aboutMe.text3: I am a strong team player and highly value the importance of collaboration. I believe that working together and leveraging each team member's strengths leads to better outcomes and fosters a positive work environment. My cooperative attitude and communication skills enable me to contribute effectively to any team.

mySkills.headline: My Skills
mySkills.text: I have gained experience in building projects with various front end technologies and concepts.

portfolio.text: Explore a selection of my work here - please feel free to try them out.
portfolio.joinDescription: Task Manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories
portfolio.elPolloLocoDescription: 'A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to collect coins, and defeat the chikens.
portfolio.pokedexDescription: Based on the Pok√©API a simple library that provides and catalouges pokemon information.

contact.headline: Contact
contact.text1: Contact me trough this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.

contactForm.privacyPolicy2: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
